hadith.chapter: The Book of Jihad and Expedition - كتاب الجهاد والسير
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا ابن نمير، حدثنا أبي، حدثنا زكرياء، بهذا الإسناد ‏.‏ وزاد قال ولم يكن أسلم أحد من عصاة قريش غير مطيع كان اسمه العاصي فسماه رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم مطيعا ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The same tradition has been narrated on the authority of Zakriyya through the same chain of transmitters with the following addition: " No rebellious Quraishite with al-Asi as his name embraced Islam that day except Muti. His name-was al-Asi, but the Messenger of Allah (way peace be upon him) changed his name to Muti.
